title: 6.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
The line graph below shows the strength of a school for five different years.

Refer to the data shown in the chart and answer the following questions:
1. During which year did the school have the highest number of students? _____________
2. What was the strength of school in 2012? _____________
3. During which year did the school have the lowest strength of students? _____________
4. How many more students did the school have in the year 2018 than in the year 2008? _____________
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
